body:
Hello everyone! :) It is great to be back on Avicus. Yes, you might be wondering what I am doing here knowing that I have left my leaving post 2 or 3 months ago. I decided that I will study hard enough to show that I can keep my grades up while playing Minecraft (Avicus in particular), and believe it or not, both my English and Finnish grades went up. So they saw it fit for me to return to Minecraft! I think that returning 2 months later is better than returning 2 years later right? Anyways, I hope to stay in Avicus for a long time and stay with it until the end. I hope to see you all in game!

Also, this is an AMA so make sure to ask me questions!
body_tagged:

So they saw it fit for me to return to Minecraft! I think that returning 2 months later is better than returning 2 years later right? Anyways, I hope to stay in Avicus for a long time and stay with it until the end. I hope to see you all in game!

Also, this is an AMA so make sure to ask me questions!

replies.body:
What grade are you in? - I am a 7th grader but I am in the preparation class where I JUST learn Finnish. Not a course..but..blah, it is complicated, I will explain it to you on Slack!

What is your dream car/truck? - A blue Rolls Royce or a Hyundai Genesis ;)

What is your favorite color? - Blue, green, and yellow (don't ask me to select one :/ )

Opinions? - You are a very patient person. Even though I promised you that I would make a small Birthday video for you, I couldn't make it, yet you didn't bug or complain. You are kind, respectful, patient, and exciting player to play with especially in Scrims ;) Stay cool Ming!

replies.body:
Where do you live? - I live in Helsinki, Finland.
Hotdog or icecream? - Gee, that is a tricky question...umm, if I was living in America right now, I would go for ice cream, but since I am living in Finland and there is plenty of ice and snow here already, I will go with hotdog!
Thank you so much! :) It is great to be back home

replies.body:
Thanks! Yes, I promise to stay this time <3

Q: What on Avicus have you missed the most?
     Which subject works out best?
     Which person have you missed the most?
     Climb trees or small mountains?

Picard*: I have missed the community the most, the days where we chat on Slack, TeamSpeak, and of course in-game.
             Hmm...anything basically works out for me except Geometry and Maths, but if I have to choose on, I would say Finnish! ;)
            I would say..Junr aka. PresidentWombat. (Sorry mep :/ ) But I did miss you as well ;)
            I prefer climbing trees ;)

Thanks!
* - If you watched Star Trek The Next Generation, you would probably understand why I wrote that. Q is a character who visits Captain Picard frequently >~<
replies.body_tagged:
Thanks! Yes, I promise to stay this time <3

replies.body:
Thanks Junr!!!!!

How have you been? - I have been great thanks! How about you?

What do you hope to see on Avicus? - I hope to see more players come here, more activity in the forums and in-game (for some reason, I feel it is emptier :( ), and more fun gamemodes which Avicus created e.g. Avimode, a gamemode which no other servers would have ;) But we will get to there step by step. Other than that, nothing else I can think of at the moment :)

Hi! A new friend! :) What are great start ;) I am Athena...and I am a friendly person who comes in peace.

I don't know you and I feel so bad for it ;-----; - No need! We will get to know each other. But I have feeling I have seen your name a lot in-game. I hope we meet each other (in game).

What's your favorite fruit? - My favorite fruit is blueberry! ;)
